name: Escape from London (DownTownKFC, janmar6, M1hkel, K2rlXYZ)
name_original: Escape from London (DownTownKFC, janmar6, M1hkel, K2rlXYZ)
description:
You are a traveller and it’s your first time in London. On the way out of the airport you bumped shoulders with a gang's boss’ niece and now he’s out for blood to regain his niece’s manhood. You have to escape the City but there’s no Flying back. You have to fight off hordes of gang members and reach the taxis in order to get out further out of the city. Good luck!

-------------------------------------

Made durning the MITS iXs GameJam in 48 hours

Game made by Team PaarisTõuked & Tommy
